ygData.subject: Re: INVIS COST
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually it s a rank 2 enchanter spell, magicians get it at lvl 8 (rank 3). But luckily we still get pay the price for a rank 2 spell. Tandayen, Dark Elf
ygData.messageBody:
Actually it's a rank 2 enchanter spell, magicians get it at lvl 8 (rank 3).
But luckily we still get pay the price for a rank 2 spell.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: Spehar, David J <David.Spehar@...>
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 06, 1999 9:52 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] INVIS COST


>From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>
>
>It cost me about 4 GP (considering that we High Elves are a much more
>aesthetically pleasing race..we get a better price by default ;) ). But
>yes...rank two magician I believe.
>
>- Ziffnab
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Chris Trubiani [mailto:u1607755@...]
>Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 9:22 AM
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] INVIS COST
>
>
>From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>
>
>Invis only costs 5gp (at least for me), which is what rank 2 spells cost
for
>someone of my charisma.
>
>Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Mata <mata_eq@...>
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Date: Thursday, May 06, 1999 9:11 AM
>Subject: [eq_wizards] INVIS COST
>
>
>>From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>>
>>Is invisibility only the cost of a RANK 2 spell since magi can use it at
>>8th?
>>
>>If it IS the full rank 5 cost, should I have a magi buy it for me? ??
>>

>>Thanks
